name: Kingdom Of Numidia (DEMO)
description:
"Kingdom of Numidia"
The Game story events covers the great historical battle of Cirta that occurred in Numidia in 203 B.C. The battle had a decisive outcome that lead to the emergence of the kingdom of Numidia. It lasted for days but the current game content covers both the events prior to the battle and the battle of Cirta. You play as Masinissa, prince of the Massylii tribe, who becomes the king of Numidia after the battle.
There will be one playable characters to play with (Masinissa), who has a distinctive combat style and different skills and abilities to unlock. Some abilities will be heavy and use brute force and deals massive damage (original Numidian warrior’s’ traits). While other abilities will be quick and agile with swift attacks (rogue traits).
Please note that this only 5% of the whole Game, so your feedback is highly appreciated
Stay tuned for more coming updates !

Donations link : Fundraiser for "Kingdom of Numidia"
